entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
